prompts: Create a cute bear-like Pokemon that loves honey and is often found in forests.
Imagine a Normal-type Pokemon with a furry body and an adorable plush design.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a teddy bear, with soft colors and a friendly demeanor.
Generate a small, cuddly Pokemon that enjoys playing in grasslands and has a playful personality.
Make a Pokemon that has a round face with a distinctive cream-colored patch on its forehead.
Design a friendly bear Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions, with a calm and gentle nature.
Give me a Pokemon that is known for its sweetness and charm, often found near sweet treats.
